title: Party rewards +0
body: Is this intentional? is it not implemented yet? when i make a party, all the party ip boost options say +0. Anyone know why?

replies.body: I may have missed this, but I'm not aware of any Party IP Rewards going on right now.  Did you have a link available for this?
http://imgur.com/a/uVa9c i assumed there was a party rewards thing active because of this, but then only got confused.
It's only for Flex queue ranked (for the first week of the new season.)

Bless you!  I stand corrected, as it looks like there is a flex IP boost per the kick off [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks).  Have fun!
<3 you Poro.  It's about time I helped you out with something^^  Have a great day.

Ah!  Thanks for the heads up on that!  We've had events in the past like bonus IP weekends that boosted IP earned based on the size of the premade.  I'm not sure if that being there is intended but I appreciate it shows as 0% since there's no event going on right now.  When you get a chance, I suggest posting about this on the[ bug report boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)just in case.  Thanks again!

Edit:  I stand corrected!
